result.title: bool operator
result.content:
struct Vector {
	int x, y;
	Vector() {}
	Vector(int x, int y) : x(x), y(y) {}
	Vector operator * (int b) {
		return Vector(x * b, y * b);
	}
	Vector operator - (Vector v2) {
		return Vector(x - v2.x, y - v2.y);
	}
	Vector operator + (Vector v2) {
		return Vector(x + v2.x, y + v2.y);
	}
	bool operator < (Vector q) {
		if (x < q.x) return true;
		if (x == q.x && y < q.y) return true;
		return false;
	}
};
